comments: To reset the registers to initial conditions, write any value to mixer address 0: Write 0 to 2x4h (set mixer address to 0) Write 0 to 2x5h (write 0 to address 0 to reset mixer)
(ES1868) Backwards compatible 3-bit register. Bits 3 and 0 are stuck on (1) on read and zeroed on write to internal state. See ESS1868 notes and register 14h.
(ES1868) Backwards compatible 2-bit register (L and R). Bit 0 is stuck on (1) on read and zeroed on write to internal state. See ESS1868 notes and register 1Ah.
(ES1868) Backwards compatible input source register. Bit 0 is zeroed on write to internal state. See ESS1868 notes and register 1Ch.
(ES1868) Backwards compatible register. Bits 3 and 0 are stuck on (1) on read and zeroed on write to internal state. See ESS1868 notes and register 32h.
(ES1868) Backwards compatible register. Bits 3 and 0 are stuck on (1) on read and zeroed on write to internal state. See ESS1868 notes and register 36h.
(ES1868) Backwards compatible register. Bits 3 and 0 are stuck on (1) on read and zeroed on write to internal state. See ESS1868 notes and register 38h.
(ES1868) Backwards compatible register. Bits 3 and 0 are stuck on (1) on read and zeroed on write to internal state. See ESS1868 notes and register 3Eh.
